summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to learn more about their upgrade services, specifically their streaming services. The customer service agent explained that streaming services are available with any of the premium plans and the cost of the upgrade depends on the current plan. The agent also informed the customer that no additional equipment or software is needed and that there is a wide selection of content available, including exclusive content. Finally, the agent mentioned that there are special discounts and promotions available for customers who upgrade their plans.
